channel.title: Zooplankton-communities on Kramer Ecology Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Zooplankton-communities on Kramer Ecology Lab

item.title: Zooplankton Coexistence
item.description: There is much room for improving understanding of the contribution of interspecific interactions, such as competition and predation, to extinction risk. I am looking at the interactions of local native and non-native cladocerans, as well as zooplankton community recovery following removal of non-native fish in Sierra Nevada lakes. I am also working to explain why temporary wetlands at the Savannah River Ecology Laboratory are able to support a hyper-diverse zooplankton community.
